caption.p: Comparative sequence and structural analyses of the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein. ( A) The cleavage sites of SARS-CoV-2 spike proteins (S1/S2 and Sâ€™ protease cleavage sites) and their comparison with those in other coronaviruses. The superimposition of the receptor-binding domain (RBDs) of SARS-CoV-2 (pdb: 6VSB) on ( B) human SARS-CoV (pdb: 2AJF), ( C) MERS-CoV (pdb: 4KR0), ( D) BtCoV-HKU4 (pdb: 4QZV), and ( E) HCoV-NL63 (pdb: 3KBH). ( F) The superimposition of the RBDs of porcine respiratory CoV (pdb: 4F5C) on HCoV-NL63 (pdb: 3KBH). RMSD: Root Mean Square Deviation. UCSF Chimera was used for the superposition and visualization of the RBDs of the different CoVs [ 40].
